author: otis
msg: - Modified to make it usable.  This way we don't have to use Ant to run LARM.

author: carlson
msg: I added the Unit Test to include a test on an unoptimized index.

author: carlson
msg: I have modified the SortedField to not access deleted documents. This caused an exception when filling the initial arrays.

author: carlson
msg: I added a static field for the default search Field.
I have added a SearchBean.close() to people can close the searcher.

author: carlson
msg: Now if there are no hits, I return a HitsIterator that will return 0 for all appropriate fields instead of returning null
I put the string "relevance" into a static variable.
